FormData.summary: The FormData interface provides a way to construct a set of key/value pairs representing form fields and their values, which can be sent using the , or methods. It uses the same format a form would use if the encoding type were set to "multipart/form-data".

remarks.para: You can also pass it directly to the constructor if you want to generate query parameters in the way a {{HTMLElement("form")}} would do if it were using simple GET submission.

An object implementing FormData can directly be used in a {{jsxref("Statements/for...of", "for...of")}} structure, instead of : for (const p of myFormData) is equivalent to for (const p of myFormData.entries()).

blockquote.para: Note: This feature is available in Web Workers.
